snippet: The Weather Channel has named the 17th winter storm of the coming season Q, after the subway train.
abstract: Weather Channel's decision to name 17th winter storm of the coming season Q, after the New York City subway train, triggered curiosity from New Yorkers, some 880 miles from the Weather Channel's headquarters in Atlanta; channel officials say they were willing to accept 'whimsical' choices near the end of the alphabetical list because it is unlikely that the storm season will require so many names.
lead_paragraph: The Weather Channel has named the 17th winter storm of the coming season Q, after the subway train.

headline.seo: Q Line Inspires Weather Channel as It Names Winter Storm
headline.main: That Name for a Storm? It’s Inspired by a Train
headline.print_headline: That Name For a Storm? It’s Inspired By a Train
